variants.Description in input context: M26I mutation leads to reduced DJ-1 expression and loss of cytoprotective function.
C106A mutation abolishes binding to ASK1 and cytoprotective activity of DJ-1.

Material used.Description: HEK293E and DJ-1 knockout MEF cells were used for experiments.

Readout description.Result Description: Expression of M26I mutant DJ-1 was reduced, leading to loss of cytoprotective function.
C106A mutation abolished binding to ASK1 and cytoprotective activity of DJ-1.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were performed in at least two independent experiments.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Analysis of variance with Bonferroni multiple comparisons post test.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.

Material used.Description: HEK293E cells were used for co-immunoprecipitation experiments.

Readout description.Result Description: M26I mutant DJ-1 constitutively binds to an aberrant site of ASK1 but fails to suppress ASK1 kinase activity and Daxx translocation.
C106A mutant DJ-1 fails to bind to ASK1 and does not form mixed disulfide bonds.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were performed in at least two independent experiments.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Analysis of variance with Bonferroni multiple comparisons post test.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal binding to ASK1 and suppression of ASK1 kinase activity.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Aberrant binding to ASK1 and failure to suppress ASK1 kinase activity.
